column2: A stone infused with gods gift, you feel protected
You did it despite what the gods told you.
A stone infused with life itself, it enjoy your company.
The power of love scream around you.
It's trying to mimic other stones but lacks substance.
The stone phases through your hands strangely.
The slime appears to have stabilised it.
That which bears the Mark of Elements must return to Ashes...\nIn the Bed of Sacred Powder, Corruption dissolves.\nSeek that which Purifies through its own Dissolution.

The Fluid that Mimics observes what surrounds it...
Place the Purified within, and nearby, a Vessel filled.
What is Near shall be Carried, what Bathes shall be Changed.
The Imitator becomes Messenger between Container and Stone...

column3:
the liquid void.
White milk upon the blackness.
Solar metal dissolved in alabaster.
Confusion itself becomes catalyst.
Every hue is touched.
The Ultimate Stone. Lapis Philosophorum."
column8:
Dans la quintessence, le néant liquide.
Le lait blanc sur la noirceur.
Le métal solaire dissous dans l'albâtre.
La confusion même devient catalyseur.
Toutes les couleurs sont touchées.
La Pierre ultime. Lapis Philosophorum.
